app_descript:
Brief

The Walmart app, powered by the renowned American retail giant, is your gateway to a convenient and personalized shopping experience. With its latest "Choose My Model" try-on feature, now in beta, the app provides an AI-assisted opportunity to envision how clothes will look on you. It streamlines everything from hot deals notifications to an array of online shopping options, making it easier than ever to navigate the extensive selection of products available at Walmart's physical and online stores.
